org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph
Class AeBpelGraph

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpeladmin.war.graph.AeBpelGraph
public class AeBpelGraph
extends java.lang.Object

AeBpelGraph is wrapper around the objects required to generate a BPEL process graph.

Field Summary
private  AeBpelGraphContainer mGraphContainer
          UI root container where the graph components are layed out
private  AeBpelProcessObject mModel
          BPEL process model
private  int mPartId
          Part id of the process to be displayed.
private  java.lang.String mPartName
          BPEL part name
private  java.lang.String mProcessName
          Name of process

          Constructs a graph object given the BPEL model, part id to be rendered and the caption or title of the graph.

mProcessName

private java.lang.String mProcessName
Name of process

mPartId

private int mPartId
Part id of the process to be displayed. E.g: Process, FaultHandlers, EventHandlers, CompensationHandler or TerminationHandler.

mPartName

private java.lang.String mPartName
BPEL part name

Constructor Detail

AeBpelGraph

public AeBpelGraph(AeBpelProcessObject aModel,
                   int aPartId,
                   java.lang.String aCaption,
                   java.util.Date aStartDate,
                   java.util.Date aEndDate)
Constructs a graph object given the BPEL model, part id to be rendered and the caption or title of the graph.

Parameters:
aModel - BPEL process model.
aPartId - root part to be rendered.
aCaption - text to be display at the bottom of the graph.
aStartDate - process start date
aEndDate - process end date

Width of the graph, in pixels.

Returns:
width or 0 if a graph is not available.

getProcessController

protected AeBpelProcessRootController getProcessController(AeBpelProcessObject aProcessModel,
                                                           int aPart)
                                                    throws AeException
Returns the root controller for this process.

Parameters:
aProcessModel - process model
aPart - part to be rendered.
Returns:
root controller based on the given part.
Throws:
AeException

createGraphContainer

protected AeBpelGraphContainer createGraphContainer(AeBpelProcessObject aProcessModel,
                                                    int aPart,
                                                    java.lang.String aCaption,
                                                    java.util.Date aStartDate,
                                                    java.util.Date aEndDate)
                                             throws AeException
Creates container to hold the UI components and lays out the components.

Parameters:
aProcessModel - process model
aPart - part to be rendered
aCaption - title to be written at the bottom.
aStartDate - process start date
aEndDate - process end date
Returns:
UI Container that holds the graph or null if unable to create a container.
Throws:
AeException

createControllerFactory

protected IAeGraphControllerFactory createControllerFactory()
Creates and returns the factory required to create the controllers.

Returns:
factory that creates the controllers.
